ingredients: 2 pieces of rye bread - lightly toasted
Sprinkle of flaked sea salt (if you feel fancy)
instructions: Place the chopped walnuts on a baking sheet under the broiler and watch carefully until lightly toasted (you will know by the change in smell.)
Toast the bread and let cool.
Spread about 1 tbsp marscarpone on each piece of toast. Then sprinkle with walnuts.
Drizzle honey on each piece of toast - don't overdo it, then top with 2 slices of pear.
Sprinkle each size with a generous amount of cinnamon and a pinch of salt (optional), and enjoy!
